Archive all group forums to node.
The number of comments show in page.
The action apply when delete an group forum.
The number of events show in page. Note: This option only effected to event layout list.
The number of groups show in page.
The number of members show in group card. Set to 0 disable it.
The number of forums which an group can owned.
The maximum content length show in news feed card. Set to 0 unlimited.
You may use {nodeTitle} for present forum title and {groupName} for present group name.

If enabled, watched content alerts and emails will only be sent to members that have visited groups within the specified number of days. This can improve performance on large or very active installations.
Show icon controls in comment actions?

Только члены группы или пользователи имеют право просматривать группу и ее содержимое.
The extra user groups members has when be promoted to this member role. When member be removed out of this member role, the user groups will be revoke.

If checked, users deleted from XenForo system will be removed from the group.
